label: 建武年中行事
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: けんむ ねんじゅうぎょうじ
見出し読み_mod: けんむ ねんじゅうぎょうじ
説明文: A chronicle, Go-Daigo crafted, which recounted the most important rituals of the state and when they should be performed.
